steps.title: Partnership Portal
steps.narration: Welcome to the Partnership Portal! This admin-only system helps manage relationships with educational organizations, churches, foundations, and businesses.

steps.title: Partner List
steps.narration: The partner list shows all organizations at a glance. Filter by type, status, or search by name. Your partnership CRM!

steps.title: Partner Details
steps.narration: Each partner has a detailed view. Contact info, interaction history, attached documents, courses offered, and analytics.

steps.title: Add Partner
steps.narration: Adding new partners is easy. Fill out the form, select type and status, and the relationship tracking begins!

steps.title: Interactions
steps.narration: Every touchpoint is recorded. Calls, meetings, emails, demosâ€”complete history of the relationship journey.

steps.title: Attachments
steps.narration: Attach files to any partner. Proposals, contracts, presentationsâ€”all organized and easily accessible.

steps.title: Analytics Dashboard
steps.narration: Time-series analytics track partnership health. Enrollments, revenue, engagementâ€”data-driven decisions!

steps.title: Schools
steps.narration: School partners include K-12 districts, individual schools, and after-school programs. Education at scale!

steps.title: Churches
steps.narration: Churches and religious organizations partner to serve their communities with tech education opportunities.

steps.title: Foundations
steps.narration: Non-profit foundations and community organizations bring funding and mission alignment to partnerships.

steps.title: Businesses
steps.narration: Corporate partners invest in workforce development. Training pipelines for future employees!

steps.title: Community Orgs
steps.narration: Community organizations provide grassroots connections. Local impact, trusted relationships!

steps.title: Free Courses
steps.narration: Partners can offer our four free evergreen courses. Apprentice through Seniorâ€”foundational curriculum!

steps.title: Custom Courses
steps.narration: Custom curriculum tailored to partner needs. Industry-specific content, branded experiences!

steps.title: Live Cohorts
steps.narration: Live cohort teaching with instructors. Scheduled classes, real-time interaction, guided learning!

steps.title: Digital Access
steps.narration: Self-paced digital access for partner members. Interactive lessons available anytime, anywhere!

steps.title: Firestore Root
steps.narration: Partnership data lives in Firestore with a hierarchical structure. Top-level partners collection with nested subcollections.

steps.title: Partners Collection
steps.narration: The partners collection holds all partner documents. Each organization gets one document identified by a unique ID.

steps.title: Partner Document
steps.narration: Each partner document contains organization details, contact info, status, and metrics. But waitâ€”there's more in subcollections!

steps.title: Interactions Subcollection
steps.narration: Every touchpoint is recorded in the interactions subcollection. Calls, meetings, emails, demosâ€”complete relationship history.

steps.title: Attachments Subcollection
steps.narration: Files and documents live in attachments. Proposals, contracts, presentationsâ€”linked to partners or specific interactions.

steps.title: Courses Subcollection
steps.narration: Partner course offerings are tracked in courses. Which courses they offer, enrollment counts, completion rates.

steps.title: Analytics Subcollection
steps.narration: Time-series analytics in the analytics subcollection. Student enrollments, cohort completions, revenueâ€”all trackable over time.

steps.title: Interaction Document
steps.narration: Each interaction document has type, notes, outcome, next steps. A complete record of every touchpoint!

steps.title: Attachment Document
steps.narration: Attachment documents store metadata and Storage URLs. File name, type, upload date, who uploaded it.

steps.title: Course Document
steps.narration: Course documents link partners to curriculum. Course ID, start date, pricing, enrollment cap, current enrollment.

steps.title: Analytics Event
steps.narration: Analytics events capture moments. Student enrolled, cohort started, revenue recordedâ€”timestamped for trending!

steps.title: Partner Entity
steps.narration: The Partner is the core entity. Everything elseâ€”interactions, attachments, courses, analyticsâ€”relates back to a partner.

steps.title: Interaction Entity
steps.narration: Partners have many interactions. Each call, meeting, or email creates a new interaction record linked to the partner.

steps.title: Attachment Entity
steps.narration: Attachments can belong to partners or specific interactions. Proposals, contracts, presentationsâ€”all linked to context.

steps.title: Partner Course
steps.narration: Partners offer courses to their members. Each course relationship tracks pricing, enrollment, and completion metrics.

steps.title: Analytics Events
steps.narration: Partners generate analytics events. Every enrollment, completion, and interaction becomes a data point for insights.

steps.title: Admin User
steps.narration: Admin users manage partners and create interactions. Every action is tracked with createdBy for accountability.

steps.title: Initial Contact
steps.narration: Every partnership begins with initial contact. A lead comes in, we add them to the system, and the journey begins!

steps.title: Prospect Status
steps.narration: New partners start as prospects. Discovery calls, evaluating fit, understanding their needs. Building the relationship foundation.

steps.title: Active Partnership
steps.narration: Agreement signed! Active partners have courses running, students enrolled, cohorts in progress. The partnership is live!

steps.title: Paused Status
steps.narration: Sometimes partnerships pause. Between cohorts, budget reviews, organizational changes. Not endedâ€”just on hold.

steps.title: Churned Status
steps.narration: Churned means the partnership ended. Lost opportunity or completed engagement. But re-engagement is always possible!

steps.title: Admin User
steps.narration: An admin just had a call with a partner. Time to record it! Every touchpoint deserves documentation.

steps.title: Interaction Form
steps.narration: The form captures detailsâ€”type, title, description, outcome, next steps. Structured data for consistent tracking.

steps.title: PartnerService
steps.narration: createInteraction in PartnerService handles the save. It updates multiple documents in a coordinated operation.

steps.title: Save Interaction
steps.narration: The interaction document is created in the subcollection. Timestamp, admin ID, all details preserved.

steps.title: Update Partner
steps.narration: The parent partner document updates tooâ€”lastInteractionAt, totalInteractions count. Quick dashboard metrics!

steps.title: Record Analytics
steps.narration: An analytics event is also recorded. This interaction becomes a data point in the partnership timeline!

steps.title: Update Timeline
steps.narration: The UI timeline updates to show the new interaction. Visual history of all touchpoints with this partner!

steps.title: Partner List UI
steps.narration: The partner list page shows all partners. Filter, search, sortâ€”find any partner quickly!

steps.title: Partner Detail UI
steps.narration: The detail page shows everything about one partner. Profile, interactions, attachments, courses, analytics.

steps.title: Partner Forms UI
steps.narration: Forms for adding and editing partners. Clean interfaces for data entry and updates.

steps.title: Timeline UI
steps.narration: The interaction timeline shows chronological history. Every touchpoint visualized on a scrollable timeline!

steps.title: Analytics Dashboard UI
steps.narration: Charts and metrics for partnership health. Trends, comparisons, insightsâ€”data visualization!

steps.title: getPartners()
steps.narration: getPartners fetches the partner list. Supports filters for type, status, search term.

steps.title: getPartner()
steps.narration: getPartner fetches one partner by ID. Includes subcollection data for the full picture.

steps.title: createPartner()
steps.narration: createPartner adds a new partner document. Initializes all fields, sets creation timestamp.

steps.title: createInteraction()
steps.narration: createInteraction records a new touchpoint. Updates partner doc and creates analytics event too.

steps.title: uploadAttachment()
steps.narration: uploadAttachment handles file uploads. Saves to Storage, creates metadata doc in Firestore.

steps.title: getAnalytics()
steps.narration: getAnalytics fetches time-series events. Supports date ranges and aggregation options.

steps.title: Firestore Database
steps.narration: All data flows to and from Firestore. The central database for partnership information.

steps.title: Firebase Storage
steps.narration: File uploads go to Firebase Storage. The URL is then saved in Firestore with metadata. Best of both!

steps.title: Student Enrolled
steps.narration: Student enrollment triggers an analytics event. A new learner joins through this partner!

steps.title: Cohort Started
steps.narration: Cohort start is a major milestone. A new group begins their learning journey with this partner!

steps.title: Cohort Completed
steps.narration: Cohort completion celebrates success. Students graduated, skills gained, outcomes achieved!

steps.title: Interaction Logged
steps.narration: Every interaction with the partner is an event. Relationship health requires consistent touchpoints!

steps.title: Revenue Recorded
steps.narration: Revenue events track financial health. Payments, sponsorships, donationsâ€”all recorded.

steps.title: Store Events
steps.narration: All events are stored with timestamps in the analytics subcollection. Time-series data ready for analysis!

steps.title: Aggregate Data
steps.narration: Events are grouped by date, type, and partner. Daily, weekly, monthly rollups enable trend analysis.

steps.title: Calculate Trends
steps.narration: Calculations reveal insights. Growth rates, completion percentages, revenue trendsâ€”metrics that drive decisions.

steps.title: Activity Line Chart
steps.narration: Line charts show trends over time. Activity spikes, seasonal patterns, growth trajectories!

steps.title: Status Bar Chart
steps.narration: Bar charts compare categories. Partners by status, revenue by type, enrollments by month!

steps.title: Type Pie Chart
steps.narration: Pie charts show composition. Partner types, course distribution, revenue breakdownâ€”parts of a whole!

steps.title: Top Partners Table
steps.narration: Tables rank partners by metrics. Top enrollers, highest revenue, most engagedâ€”leaderboard style!

steps.title: Admin Section
steps.narration: Partnership pages live under the admin section. Only users with admin role can access any of these features.

steps.title: Partnerships Folder
steps.narration: The partnerships folder contains all portal pages. A logical grouping within the admin area.

steps.title: Partner List Page
steps.narration: index.html is the main dashboard. All partners listed with filters, search, and quick actions.

steps.title: Partner Detail Page
steps.narration: partner.html shows individual partner details. Timeline, attachments, courses, metricsâ€”the complete picture.

steps.title: Add Partner Page
steps.narration: add.html is the partner creation form. Enter all details to start tracking a new partnership!

steps.title: Analytics Page
steps.narration: analytics.html provides the big picture. Aggregate metrics across all partnerships, trends, and insights.

questions.question: Who can access the Partnership Portal?
questions.explanation: The Partnership Portal is admin-onlyâ€”requires the admin role to access any features.

questions.question: What types of organizations can be partners?
options: Schools, churches, foundations, businesses, and more
questions.explanation: Partners include schools, churches, foundations, businesses, community organizations, and government entities.

questions.question: What is the initial status for a new partner?
questions.explanation: New partners start as prospects during the discovery and evaluation phase.

questions.question: What does 'churned' status mean?
questions.explanation: Churned means the partnership has endedâ€”either a lost opportunity or completed engagement.

questions.question: Where are partner file attachments stored?
questions.explanation: File attachments use Firebase Storage, with metadata and URLs saved in Firestore.
